item.title: by: Jeff Shell
item.description:
(On the statement print "42 monkeys"+"1 snake") BTW, both perl and Python get this wrong. Perl gives 43 and Python gives "42 monkeys1 snake", when the answer is clearly "41 monkeys and 1 fat snake".

Jim Fulton

I always liked this story.
item.content:encoded:
(On the statement print “42 monkeys”+”1 snake”) BTW, both
perl and Python get this wrong. Perl gives 43 and Python
gives “42 monkeys1 snake”, when the answer is clearly “41
monkeys and 1 fat snake”.

Jim Fulton

I always liked this story.
